name: Big Guns n' Chickens
description:
I'm happy to announce Big Guns n' Chickens. A challenging one tap Casual game.
If you're willing to play the Game on Android, get it here or download it from the Playstore

Any suggestions or new ideas? Experiencing any bugs 💩 or problems? Please write me a PN or post a comment!

i hope you have fun with Big Guns n' Chickens

❤ thank you for playing ❤
